title: Bug 4971 - Strange 'copy package'
description:
When performing the 'copy package' operation in org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui within jdt.ui3, the following steps were taken:
1. Select xxx as the source package
2. Choose a destination

OB: After executing the 'copy package' operation, the destination xx package now contains a package called 'ui' alongside the copied package.

EB:

SR:
